casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. UTILITIES COM'N
v.
CP&L. No. 649A03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2006. Christopher J. Ayers, Robert B. Schwentker, Thomas K. Austin, Raleigh, Kodwo Ghartey-Tagoe, Charlotte, for Duke Power & NC Elec. Memb.

Leonard G. Green, Assistant Attorney General, Pro Se.

Antoinette R. Wike, Raleigh, for Public Staff-Utilities Comm. Pamela A. Scott, Raleigh, Michael S. Colo, Rocky Mount, for Municipal Power Agency. Carson Carmichael, Ralph McDonald, Raleigh, for Carolina Industrial Groups. James P. West, Raleigh, for Carolina Utilities Cus. Asso.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of January 2006 by Appellants (Municipal Power Agency) for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Denied. By order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of January 2006."
